Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 定义页适配器的接口。

span.span: Defines the interface to a page adapter.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有页适配器必须都实现此接口。All page adapters must implement this interface. 此接口继承自接口，所以实现此接口的任何类还必须实现接口。This interface inherits from the interface, so any class that implements this interface must also implement the interface. 最简单的解决方案是从派生类基本类，该类提供的默认实现接口。The easiest solution is to derive a class from the base class, which provides a default implementation of the interface.

permission.span: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为某些设备处理方式不同于其他的回发，则此方法允许修改该集合的适配器。Because some devices handle postback differently than others, this method allows the adapter to modify the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值是`true`默认情况下，如果`CookielessDataDictionaryType`中的条目`MobileControls`Web.config 配置节设置为有效的字典类型。This value is `true` by default, if the `CookielessDataDictionaryType` entry in the `MobileControls` configuration section of Web.config is set to a valid dictionary type.
